channel.title: I can't figure out how to play -.0
channel.description:
Sorry for being dumb. :| I'm totally clueless. How do I know what name to log on with? Does the name matter? It's making it seem like it doesn't. If this helps.. It says error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "cancel" then "start server" to make your own. ^Doesn't make sense to me. To I have to make my own server in order to log in to moparscape? :confused:
Again, sorry if this is the dumbest thing you've ever read. But please help.

item.title: I can't figure out how to play -.0
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

[quote=“B D K Pk, post:1, topic:81467”]Sorry for being dumb.
I’m totally clueless. How do I know what name to log on with? Does the name matter? It’s making it seem like it doesn’t.
If this helps…
It says error connecting to server. Must be down. Click “cancel” then “start server” to make your own.
^Doesn’t make sense to me.
To I have to make my own server in order to log in to moparscape?

Again, sorry if this is the dumbest thing you’ve ever read. But please help.[/quote]

1.names do not matter.
2.when it says error connecting it means it’s down or just busy.
3.when it says start to make your server …dosent mean your gonan acutlly make it.Its just an open source.
4.have fun.
5.127.0.0.1 IS THE OPEN SOURCE./1 person only,its you.
Hope that help’s

Read full topic
